verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> in many <S%G4183>things<s%> we <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G4417>stumble.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G4417>stumble<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> is a <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G5468>bridle<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G4143>ships<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G5607>though<s%> they are so <S%G5082>big<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1643>driven<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G4642>fierce<s%> <S%G417>winds,<s%> are yet <S%G3329>guided<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> a very <S%G1646>small<s%> <S%G4079>rudder,<s%> <S%G3699%G99999>wherever<s%> the <S%G2116>pilot<s%> <S%G3730><s%> <S%G1014>desires.<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3196>member,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> boasts great <S%G3166>things.<s%> <S%G2400>See<s%> how a <S%G3641>small<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> can <S%G381>spread<s%> to a <S%G2245>large<s%> <S%G5208>forest!<s%>

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G2525>is<s%> a <S%G4442>fire.<s%> The <S%G2889>world<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G3779><s%> <S%G2525>is<s%> the <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> which <S%G4695>defiles<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sets on <S%G5394>fire<s%> the <S%G5164>course<s%> of <S%G1078>nature,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is set on <S%G5394>fire<s%> by <S%G1067>Gehenna.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5449>kind<s%> of <S%G5037>animal,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4071>bird,<s%> <S%G5037><s%> creeping <S%G2062>thing,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> thing in the <S%G1724>sea,<s%> is <S%G1150>tamed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> has been <S%G1150>tamed<s%> by <S%G5449>mankind.<s%>

<S%G1722>With<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G2127>we<s%> bless our <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G2672>we<s%> curse <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> in the <S%G3669>image<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> is wise <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1990>understanding<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you?<s%> Let him <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G391>conduct<s%> that <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> are done <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4240>gentleness<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> that which comes <S%G2718>down<s%> from <S%G509>above,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> is <S%G1919>earthly,<s%> <S%G5591>sensual,<s%> and <S%G1141>demonic.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> that <S%G2076>is<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%> is <S%G4412%G99999>first<s%> <S%G53>pure,<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G1516>peaceful,<s%> <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> <S%G2138>reasonable,<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruits,<s%> without <S%G87>partiality,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G505>hypocrisy.<s%>
